faqs.title: How does your white label Shopify development work?
faqs.content: We work as your backend Shopify development team. You manage the client relationship, branding, and pricing, while we handle development, testing, and delivery under a strict NDA.

faqs.title: Will you communicate directly with my clients?
faqs.content: No. We never contact your clients. All communication stays strictly between you and our team to ensure a true white label experience.

faqs.title: Where is your Shopify development team located?
faqs.content: Our Shopify development team is based in India. We work with agencies across the USA, UK, and Australia, delivering cost-efficient and high-quality Shopify solutions.

faqs.title: Will I own the source code and project assets?
faqs.content: Yes. Once the project is completed and paid for, you or your client will have full ownership of the source code, files, and all intellectual property.

faqs.title: Can you match my working hours or time zone?
faqs.content: Yes. We offer overlapping working hours for US, UK, and Australian time zones to ensure smooth communication and faster project delivery.

faqs.title: How do we communicate and track progress?
faqs.content: We adapt to your preferred tools such as Slack, ClickUp, Jira, Trello, or Asana, and provide regular updates, progress tracking, and detailed reports.

faqs.title: What type of Shopify work can you handle?
faqs.content: We handle everything from Shopify store development and theme customization to Shopify Plus, headless builds, migrations, and third-party app integrations.

faqs.title: What hiring or engagement models do you offer?
faqs.content: We offer flexible engagement models including Fixed Cost, Time & Material, and Hourly or Dedicated Shopify Developer options.

faqs.title: What if my workload increases or I need faster delivery?
faqs.content: We can quickly scale developers or working hours based on your needs, without disrupting your ongoing projects or timelines.

faqs.title: Is there any long-term contract or minimum commitment?
faqs.content: No. We keep our engagement flexible. You can start small and scale as your agency grows, with no mandatory long-term contracts.
